Description: Imported guitar 10 years ago in 2008, rolex style with Gold and Chrome hardware. 1960 Model, comes with mother of pearl lettering on headstock. Ever wanted an amazing guitar that didn't cost 3,000.00 , but also didn't sound like a cheap import? You can now have a guitar that sounds and looks like the real thing. How? strip it down of all imported hardware to body and neck. Next: Install all Genuine Gibson pots, wiring, bridge, tailpiece, and genuine vintage Bumble Bee capacitors. Refit and engineer the neck to install Genuine Grover tuners. Amazing guitar tone with Seymour Duncan and DiMarzio pick ups. Have it professionally checked and set up. The Guitar has been stored in Hard shell case in smoke free closet for most of its 10 years. Has a few finish blemishes and some light scratches. However, Looks fabulous, Sounds amazing, and plays as it should. All guitars feel different to different people, so I can't say its for you. For the price, you can love it. Comes in beautiful locking imported Hard Case...The hole between bridge Vol and Tone is for a Jimmy Page mini toggle switch. Most of the pre-circuit board pots do not have coil tap. The switch lets you wire a cutoff to the pick ups for out of phase, or tap for single coil. Flamed highly figured Maple top Standard binding and Honeyburst Finish Standard headstock with mother of pearl lettering / Gold 1960 truss rod cover Neck pick up Seymour Duncan PG1 N Pearly Gates (removable gold stickum) Bridge pick up DiMarzio PAF 36th Anniversary pick up (removable gold stickum) Gold Grover tuners-chrome screws Gibson Nickle Chrome ABR-1 Bridge and Tailpiece/Gold adjusters and hold down Chrome locking strapsInstalled 1960 Pick GuardPearlized TrapezoidsPre Drilled for Jimmy Page mini Toggle switch No Claim is made that this used imported guitar is a Gibson USA.
Title: 2008 LP Standard 1960 model Guitar Seymour Duncan Dimarzio Honey Burst Gibson
ConditionDescription: Used in excellent condition with some swirls and finish blemishes shown in photos.
